attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If label is not submitted, text will default to url

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Default html syntax. Choose between '_blank' (new tab/window), '_self' (default), '_parent', '_top' or name of iframe.

attributes.name: download
attributes.description: Pass 'true' to make file download on link click

attributes.name: customDownloadFilename
attributes.description: Custom filename for when file downloads. Assumes download attribute is set to 'true'
